articles.title: Lloyds Engineering Works Receives Authorization for International Deployment of Eco Pickled Surface Systems
articles.description: Lloyds Engineering Works has been authorized to deploy eco pickled surface systems internationally, enabling global expansion of its environmentally sustainable surface treatment solutions. This strategic development allows the company to offer its eco-friendly technology across international markets, representing a significant milestone in its operational expansion beyond domestic boundaries.
articles.content: Lloyds Engineering Works has received authorization to deploy eco pickled surface systems internationally, marking a significant expansion of its operational capabilities beyond domestic markets. This development positions the company to offer enviro... [4009 chars]

articles.title: Musk’s AI Grok generates sexualized images of kids
articles.description: Just days after a global backlash erupted over Elon Musk’s AI chatbot Grok generating sexualized deepfakes of women and children, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said the Pentagon will embrace the technology. Hegseth said Monday that Grok will soon be deployed on “every unclassified and classified network” throughout the department. U.S. officials are endorsing the technology […]
articles.content:
Just days after a global backlash erupted over Elon Musk’s AI chatbot Grok generating sexualized deepfakes of women and children, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said the Pentagon will embrace the technology.
Hegseth said Monday that Grok will soon be... [1982 chars]

articles.title: 'SHANTI Act will get us 100 GW in nuclear power by 2047'
articles.description: Union Minister of Science and Technology (Independent Charge) and MoS of Atomic Energy, Dr Jitendra Singh, asserts that the SHANTI Act opens up the atomic energy sector for private participation while retaining full sovereignty. He said India is fully atmanirbhar in space launch vehicles and has built satellites for all space applications, such as earth observation, communication, and navigation. He tells TNIE that India has achieved self-reliance in the production and use of nuclear energy and has set a goal […]
articles.content:
Union Minister of Science and Technology (Independent Charge) and MoS of Atomic Energy, Dr Jitendra Singh, asserts that the SHANTI Act opens up the atomic energy sector for private participation while retaining full sovereignty.
He said India is full... [7429 chars]

articles.title: Opposition manufacturing motivated apprehensions against ‘G Ram G’ Act: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Jan 13 : Alleging that the Opposition is manufacturing motivated apprehensions against “G Ram G” Act, Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences, and MoS PMO, Personnel, Public Grievances, Pensions, Atomic Energy and Space, Dr. Jitendra Singh said here today that a responsible government has a duty to place facts clearly before the public, without political colouring, especially when policies directly impact villages, livelihoods, and long-term national outcomes. With this objective, the Minister said, he […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
NEW DELHI, Jan 13 : Alleging that the Opposition is manufacturing motivated apprehensions against “G Ram G” Act, Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences, and MoS PMO, Personnel, Pu... [3565 chars]

articles.title: IIT Jammu hosts workshop on Tribal Heritage Mapping
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Jan 13: Minister for Jal Shakti, Forest, Ecology & Environment and Tribal Affairs, Javed Ahmed Rana, today said that tribal heritage constitutes a living, dynamic knowledge system embedded in language, belief structures, customary practices and social organisation. He emphasised that its preservation requires a participatory, community-driven research framework that acknowledges indigenous epistemologies and lived traditions. The Minister was addressing a workshop, as the chief guest, titled “Mapping Tribal Heritage”, organised by the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Jan 13: Minister for Jal Shakti, Forest, Ecology & Environment and Tribal Affairs, Javed Ahmed Rana, today said that tribal heritage constitutes a living, dynamic knowledge system embedded in language, belief structures... [4221 chars]

articles.title: SKUAST-K organises awareness programme on safe use of pesticides
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent KASHMIR, Jan 13: Directorate of Extension, Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology of Kashmir (SKUAST-K) in collaboration with the HIL (India) Limited, organized an awareness programme on the `Safe and Judicious use of pesticides and promotion of IPM practices, here today. Nivedita Shukla Verma, Secretary (Chemicals & Petrochemicals), Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers, GoI, graced the occasion as the chief guest. Maninder Kaur Dwivedi, Additional Secretary (Agriculture), Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare, GoI; Prof Raihana H […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
KASHMIR, Jan 13: Directorate of Extension, Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology of Kashmir (SKUAST-K) in collaboration with the HIL (India) Limited, organized an awareness programme on the `Safe an... [2283 chars]

articles.title: Prof Sanjay Khajuria of SKUAST-J gets ICAR Performance Excellence Award
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Jan 13: Prof Sanjay Khajuria, presently working as Chief Scientist & Head at Krishi Vigyan Kendra Samba of SKUAST Jammu has been decorated with Performance Excellance Award by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research- Agricultural Technology Application Research Institute for Northern States with headquater at Punjab Agricultural University Ludhiana. The Award was presented to him by Dr Rajeshwar Singh Chandel, Vice-Chancellor Dr Y S Parmar University of Horticulture and Forestry, Solan, HP in august presence of Dr […]
articles.content:
By
Daily Excelsior
-
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Jan 13: Prof Sanjay Khajuria, presently working as Chief Scientist & Head at Krishi Vigyan Kendra Samba of SKUAST Jammu has been decorated with Performance Excellance Award by the Indian Council of ... [920 chars]

articles.title: Iran Deploying New Technologies to Curb Protests
articles.description: Citing experts, CNN reported that Iran is using cutting-edge military technology and sophisticated psychological operations to dismantle protests against the government that have taken over the country.
articles.content:
Iran is using cutting-edge military technology and sophisticated psychological operations to dismantle protests against the government that have taken over the country, CNN reported, citing experts.
According to the outlet, low-flying surveillance dr... [2667 chars]

articles.title: Britain seeks 'reset' in copyright battle between AI and creators
articles.description: LONDON, Jan 13 (Reuters) - British technology ‌minister Liz Kendall said on Tuesday the government was seeking a "reset" ‌on plans to overhaul copyright rules to accommodate artificial intelligence, pledging ‌to protect creators while unlocking AI's economic potential.
articles.content: LONDON, Jan 13 (Reuters) - British technology ‌minister Liz Kendall said on Tuesday the government was seeking a "reset" ‌on plans to overhaul copyright rules to accommodate artificial intelligence, pledging ‌to protect creators while unlocking AI's ... [1722 chars]

articles.title: Uncovering a hidden mechanism in Met receptor activation
articles.description: Researchers at the Nano Life Science Institute (WPI-NanoLSI), Kanazawa University, in collaboration with Osaka University and the National Institutes for Quantum Science and Technology, have uncovered a previously unknown mechanism behind the activation of the Met receptor—a key player in tissue regeneration and cancer progression.
articles.content: Researchers at the Nano Life Science Institute (WPI-NanoLSI), Kanazawa University, in collaboration with Osaka University and the National Institutes for Quantum Science and Technology, have uncovered a previously unknown mechanism behind the activat... [3392 chars]
